page.title: 04SERVICES
page.content: Post is collected and delivered daily except Sunday-Newspapers by arrangement. There are no shops but several mobile delivery vans. Milk is delivered every other day also eggs and cream supplied. Baker calls thrice a week bringing bread, cakes and groceries. Two butchers vans from Morebattle and Ancrum sell fresh twice weekly. Fish van calls weekly. A whole foods and vegetarian foodstuffs van calls once a fortnight. A Kelso and Otterburn coal merchant calls fortnightly during winter months. Calor Gas, Heating Oil, Chimney Sweep, and Window Cleaner calls as required. The Re4gional Council Mobile Library calls fortnightly. Dustcarts from Kelso call weekly to collect refuse. Doctors, District Nurses, Health Visitor and Police from Jedburgh and Kelso. Phone kiosks in each village.
